llm_res.rule: Every NFT is identified by a unique uint256 ID inside the ERC-721 smart contract. This identifying number SHALL NOT change for the life of the contract.
llm_res.function: Potential violation in token ID handling, ensure immutability and uniqueness.

llm_res.rule: allowance: Returns the amount which _spender is still allowed to withdraw from _owner.
llm_res.function: allowance function is missing in the contract.

llm_res.rule: Metadata extension is optional but if implemented, it must adhere to the ERC721Metadata interface.
